page.title: 08THE YOUNG SAVER IN PRUDHOE
page.content: Most of Prudhoe's nine banks and building societies have a special scheme for young savers. Examples of these are "The Little Extra Club" (Halifax Building Society) and "Super Savers" (Northern Rock Building Society). The most popular schemes were those which offered gifts such as folders, bags and piggy banks or saver boxes, as all the savings schemes offered almost the same interest rates of around 8% on money invested. In a survey of twelve year old children the Northern Rock and the Trustee Savings Bank schemes were most popular.{ Some children said that they did not have enough money to be able to save (average pocket money Â£1.50 per week).Others were able to save through income from newspaper rounds etc.
